title: Teen shot on Indian Oaks Circle
content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. —
Metrosafe said a teenager was shot in the 5600 block of Indian Oaks Circle.
The call came in a little after 8 p.m.
A Louisville Metro Police Department spokeswoman said the boy was alert and conscious when he was transported to University Hospital.
The Major Crimes Division is handling the investigation.
There has been no word on any arrests.
